name: BIMflow Room Numbering
description:
Set numbers for rooms, it works in the rooms in active view or selected rooms, with flixibility in numbering system,

how it works:
in Revit, draw lines from left to right, and from up to down,
select the lines and select the rooms
select the setting you want and hit run
contents:
BIMflow Room Numbering - Set numbers for rooms, it works in the rooms in active view or selected rooms, with flixibility in numbering system,

how it works:
in Revit, draw lines from left to right, and from up to down,
select the lines and select the rooms
select the setting you want and hit run
